[[value_with_leading_accent]]
	en = `value
[[value_with_trailing_accent]]
	en = value`
[[value_with_leading_space]]
	en = ` value`
	fr = ` eulav`
[[value_with_trailing_space]]
	en = `value `
[[value_wrapped_by_spaces]]
	en = ` value `
[[value_wrapped_by_accents]]
	en = ``value``
[[some_plural_value]]
	[en]
		one = 1 value
		other = %d value
	[fr]
		one = 1 eulav
		other = %d eulav
